Class ViewerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewerController

  • public class ViewerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the viewer-side application including its network connectivity and GUI.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ViewerController.CloseListener
      Custom listener based on CloseListener that, when invoked, safely closes the network connection before exiting the application.
      private class  ViewerController.PopupSendButtonListener
      Custom listener based on ActionListener that, when invoked, sends a popup request Parcel to the remote.
      private class  ViewerController.TabSwitchListener
      Custom listener based on ChangeListener that, when invoked, sends a screen request Parcel to the remote.
      private class  ViewerController.TerminalRunButtonListener
      Custom listener based on ActionListener that, when invoked, sends a terminal request Parcel to the remote.

    • Method Detail

      • startReceiving

        private void startReceiving()
        Starts a loop that continuously receives incoming Parcels from the remote. Parcels are passed on to the relevant handler based on feature name.

      • handleScreenParcel

        private void handleScreenParcel(java.lang.Object payload)
        Handler for Parcels of the screen feature. Gets the screenshot, calculates its dimensions and aspect ratio, and displays the correctly scaled image in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        payload - "start" or "stop"

      • getScaledImage

        private java.awt.Image getScaledImage(java.awt.Image image,
                                      int width,
                                      int height)
        Scales an image to the specified dimensions.
        Parameters:
        image - source image to scale
        width - target image width
        height - target image height
        Returns:
        scaled image
